name: "Crash of the Titans" - "The Emerald Pity" Quiz  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where is the concept art located in this level?
questions.explanation:
High Ramp.

	At the very beginning of the level, you use your board.  The concept art can be found at the highest of these ramps, up in the trees.  In the beginning you can also find a spy toilet.

questions.text: How many total bombs must you destroy in the mojo room?
questions.explanation:
Fifteen.

	You must destroy a total of fifteen bombs in the mojo room.  You destroy six bombs with the first set given to you.  The second set includes nine bombs you must destroy.

questions.text: What is the first new jackable creature you meet in this level?
questions.explanation:
Rhinoroller.

	Rhinorollers are large creatures with strong, spiked armor.  You can ride these Rhinorollers, and their special power involves rolling up into a ball and crushing everything in its path.

questions.text: What color is the burp of the koala enemy?
questions.explanation:
Purple.

	The koala's, called Koo-Alas, burp purple acid at you.  It is the main attack of the Koo-Ala.  The Koo-Ala's were made by Nina Cortex.

No.

	When you are riding a Rhinoroller, don't worry about avoiding bombs.  They will do no damage to him.  However, watch out for the blades, as they will hurt the Rhinoroller.

questions.text: What is the color of the lights on the massive structure?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	There are a total of seven red lights on the giant structure.  There are no blue, green, or yellow lights on the structure.

questions.text: What direction does the platform in the massive structure take you?
questions.explanation:
Up.

	This is the end of the level.  You get on the platform, in the massive structure, thus ending the level.  This is where you will begin the next level.

questions.text: How many total jackable creatures are in this level?
questions.explanation:
One.

	There is only one jackable creature in this level; the Rhinoroller.  You use the Rhinoroller a lot in this level, so make sure you jack one.

questions.text: Do you ever use the slide in this level?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	In fact, most of this level is sliding.  Whether it is on your board or a Rhinoroller, a good amount of this level involves sliding.  The board is made of Aku Aku's face.

questions.text: How many minions must you defeat to get the minion master?
questions.explanation:
Twenty.

	You must defeat only twenty Koo-Ala's in this level.  Koo-Ala's are purple koalas who burp purple acid at you to attack you.
